mapper.select: select a.ASSET_ROW_ID,a. DATA_USER_NAME,a. CPL_DT,a. PROM_NAME,a. AGENT_POINT_ID,a. SALES_DEPT_NAME,a. KD_ZJ_AREA_NAME,a. STAT_NAME,a. FJ_AREA_NAME,a. ZJ_AREA_NAME,a. CHANNEL_DEPT_NAME_2014,a. CHANNEL_LVL1_NAME,a. MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID,a. MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,a. SXT_PROM_NAME,a. ZNJJ_PROM_NAME,a. PROM_INTEG_ID,a. YBJM_PROM_NAME,a. GIS_CLUSTER_ID,a. CLUSTER_NAME,a. KJB_PROM_NAME, a.val_new from nbetl.rpt_lyn_zhjt_asset_sbj@"XFK.REGRESS.RDBMS.DEV.US.ORACLE.COM" a where a.cpl_dt between #{start} and #{end} and a.fj_area_name='宁波鄞州分公司'
